title: Bloudy newse [sic] from the north, and the ranting Adamites declaration concerning the King of Scotland with their new league, covenant, and protestation, their denying the great God of heaven, and burning his sacred vvord and Bible, the name of a new god by them chosen, and his speech and promise unto them, their new law and grand court, their arraignment and tryal, and a copy of the several articles and indictment ... : also, a bloudy plot discovered, concerning their resolution to murther all those that will not turn ranters, put in execution at York ...
author: Tilbury, Samuel.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
